name: Cube: Colors!
description:
Merge the Colors !!

Cube: Colors is a game in which you need to Merge cubes of similar colors, to make points, and to get Cubes To choose and buy from 6 different skins available in the game, Come and Become a CubeMaster!

The game has 3 different modes, Easy, Normal and CubeDrop!

Easy mode

Only 3 colors appear, and you get 2 coins every 10 points!

Normal Mode

There are 5 colors, and you get 5 coins for every 10 points!

CubeDrop Mode

Considered the most exclusive and difficult way, you win 8 coins every 10 points!

Skins

Each skin needs a level to unlock, among them we have

Chocolate Cube, Level 2

Magic Cube, level 4

Dice, level 6

Geometric Cube, Level 8

Checkers Cube, Level 10

Gift Box, Level 12

Each Level You Earn a Name, to show to your friends!

Level 1, Newbie

Level 3, Starter

Level 5, Experienced

Level 7, Specialist

Level 9, Professional

Level 12, Legend

Level 15, CubeMaster!

If You Find Some Bug Or Error, Contact:

FuzzyGameDev@gmail.com

Thanks For Playing My Game!
